item.title: What Is Beta in Investing And How Does It Measure Stock Risk?
item.description: A stock’s beta value helps investors understand whether it tends to move more or less aggressively than the benchmark index they follow.

item.title: SELLAS Life Sciences Group Stock Soars As It Nears Final Analysis In Cancer Study
item.description: The ongoing GPS trial is an overall survival study and final analysis is expected once 80 deaths have occurred.

item.title: What’s Driving Nutriband Shares Higher Today?
item.description: Nutriband has agreed to sell 90% of its stake in its subsidiary Pocono Pharmaceuticals for $5 million.
